tasks.why: Your team is counting on you to lead this. Show them you've got this!
tasks.coreWhy: Clear communication keeps the team aligned and productive.

subtasks.text: Review last week's action items and status (~5min)
Draft agenda with key discussion points (~10min)
Prepare any visuals or data needed (~15min)

tasks.text: Learn the basics of a new productivity tool
tasks.why: Investing time to learn now saves hours later. You're building skills.
tasks.coreWhy: Mastering tools improves efficiency and reduces frustration.

subtasks.text: Watch intro tutorial or read getting started guide (~15min)
Set up account and configure preferences (~10min)
Try the core features with a test project (~20min)
Note down questions and look up answers (~10min)
Create a cheat sheet of useful shortcuts (~5min)

tasks.text: Clean and organize home office desk
tasks.why: A clear space means a clear mind. Get it done.
tasks.coreWhy: An organized workspace reduces distractions and boosts focus.

subtasks.text: Sort items into keep, toss, and relocate piles (~10min)
Return only essential items to desk (~5min)
